TopicTitle: Lurker bit the bullet and signed up. Just a quick hello!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! Ive just started getting into KSP recently (picked it up on steam) and of course, now I'm hooked! Started getting into mods and one thing led to another and here I am. I hope to help out in this great community and try not to ask too many ridiculous questions (Complete noob when it comes to KSP) Haha.

 

Anyways, I've been a long time PC player and have a soft spot for simulation games and pretty much any game with good modding support/community!

 

Fly Dangerous! 

 

-The Dodger

Hello again, @TheJollyDodger, and welcome aboard!

 

Feel free to ask any question about the game in the Gameplay Help and Tutorials subforums, or just share what you've done in General Discussion or Mission Reports/Fanworks.
